result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

Until further order of the court, you shall have no contact, directly or indirectly, either personally, by mail, telephone or through any other person, except through your attorney, with any of the following individuals and/or businesses: T. B. and K. P.  AMENDED 11-16-15:  No contacts are dropped.

Until further order of the court, you shall have no contact, directly or indirectly, either personally, by mail, telephone or through any other person, except through your attorney, with any of the following individuals and/or businesses: T. B. and K. P.  AMENDED 11-16-15:  No contacts are dropped.

Attorney Alyssa Dominguez appears on behalf of her client.  Melissa Inlow appears for the State.  Attorney Dominguez is requesting the defendant's no contact be dropped so he can live with his mother.  His mother K.P) is present in court.  T.B. is also present and is requesting the no contact be dropped with her also.  ADA Inlow states if they call again we will not be willing to drop it the next time.  Judge questions defendant's mother and T.B. regarding the no contact being lifted.  Judge orders bond be amended to remove the no contact for these 2 people.  He must come in this week to sign a new bond.  Attorney Dominguez said that won't be a problem.

Pre-trial conference at 11-11-2015 10:00 am.
Status conference at 11-30-2015 03:00 pm.

Pre-trial conference at 11-04-2015 10:00 am.
Status conference at 11-30-2015 03:00 pm.

ADA Melissa Inlow appears for the State.  Defendant appeared in person with  Attorney Dominguez.  Reading of the complaint waived.  Defendant entered NGP.  NGP entered.  PTC set for 11/11 at STC 11/30/15 at 3 pm.  Set STC on all cases for 11/30.

Until further order of the court, you shall have no contact, directly or indirectly, either personally, by mail, telephone or through any other person, except through your attorney, with any of the following individuals and/or businesses: T. B. and K. P.
Defendant appeared by video from the Jackson County Jail.

ADA Melissa Inlow appears for the State.  Defendant appeared by video from the Jackson County Jail.  Defendant received a copy of the complaint.  Court recited the charges and possible penalties.  Defendant understood.  Defendant will contact SPD.  Bond set.  AIA set for 10/19/15 at 9:30 am.
